findings.title: Potential reentrancy in removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens is vulnerable to potential reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in transfer and approve functions of IERC20Extended interface
findings.description: The transfer and approve functions of the IERC20Extended interface are vulnerable to unprotected function calls.

findings.title: Unprotected function call in <Constructor> of Auth implementation
findings.description: The constructor of the Auth contract contains an unprotected function call.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in authorize, unauthorize, and transferOwnership functions of Auth implementation
findings.description: The authorize, unauthorize, and transferOwnership functions in the Auth implementation are vulnerable to unprotected function calls.
